com.autopia4j.framework.assertions

Class BasicAssertion

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.autopia4j.framework.assertions.BasicAssertion
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    TestNgWrappedAssertion, TestNgWrappedSoftAssertion

    public class BasicAssertion
extends Object
    Basic Assertion class for autopia4j
    Assertions within this class do not block the test execution
    Author:
    vj
